action.action-desc: Mr. McKinley (for himself and Ms. Sherrill) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide that grants under the COPS program may be used for salary increases to retain officers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Retain COPS Act of 2022.

section.header: Additional authorized use of COPS grant funds
section.text: Section 1701(b) of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10381(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (23), by redesignating such paragraph as paragraph (24);

subparagraph.text: by redesignating such paragraph as paragraph (23); and
by striking (1) through (21); and and inserting (1) through (22); and; and

paragraph.text: by inserting after paragraph (21) the following:
to retain law enforcement officers by providing salary increases;
